name: GeoGuesser Hacker
description: AI-powered location analysis for GeoGuessr. Uses hierarchical StreetCLIP prediction (country→region→city) for enhanced accuracy and precise coordinates.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://extensionpay.com https://us-central1-geoguesser-hacker-ext.cloudfunctions.net http://localhost:8081 http://localhost:8082; object-src 'self'
